categories: Category:Cut content from Battle of the Sith Lords

nodes.text: Darth VaGhal was a female human Sith Lord with yellow eyes and black markings on her face and forehead. She wielded a purple bladed lightsaber.

Darth VaGhal was a proposed character for the video game Battle of the Sith Lords, which was being developed by Red Fly Studio around 2011. Concept art for the character was published by artist Thomas A. Szakolczay on his ArtStation profile.
